Dear Sami,

Thanks, I'm doing well and I hope you are too.

We’ll move forward with the block insurance on our end. You can request the store endorsement from SAICO, as they are managing the PAR policies.

Could you please provide the stock value for the boutique & the opening date? Thank you.

Best regards,

Tarek

TAREK FAKHEREDDIN​​​​
